resources.string: cFood is an app that gives you the user the ability to look up information on popular neighbourhoods in New Westminster
The app consists of 3 pages: Main (where we just were), Neighbourhoods (where we are) and Details (where we\'re going to be)
This page lists all the different neighbourhoods. We get the list from the database which is populated using JSON objects
This activity main content with a listview with a custom layout for each item
You\'ll notice that not only is the layout unique but so is the style. This is done using XML files in the folder: drawable
Now we can move on to the next page by tapping an item
